de.polygonal.ds.Compare

type
class
Basic comparison functions.

Static Methods

compareNumberFall<T>(a : Float, b : Float) : Int

Numeric descending order.

compareNumberRise<T>(a : Float, b : Float) : Int

Numeric ascending order.

compareStringCaseInSensitiveFall(a : String, b : String) : Int

String case insensitive descending order.

compareStringCaseInSensitiveRise(a : String, b : String) : Int

String case insensitive ascending order.

compareStringCaseSensitiveFall(a : String, b : String) : Int

String case sensitive descending order.

compareStringCaseSensitiveRise(a : String, b : String) : Int

String case sensitive ascending order.
